company_name: CONTRACTING AND CONSTRUCTION ENTERPRISES LTD CO.
policy_holder: CONTRACTING AND CONSTRUCTION ENTERPRISES LTD CO

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation required for VIP members for outpatient and in-patient services, except for services that have explicitly stated limits (e.g., dental, maternity, optical, renal aids/dialysis, and hearing aids). Medication limit is equal to the pre-authorization approval limit (SR 100,000.00).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Epidural Injection is covered whenever medically necessary. Hajj Vaccinations are covered for VIP. Maternity benefits include 3D Ultrasound if medically justified. Vitamins are covered when prescribed for a covered illness. Dental & Optical cash reimbursement allowed only for Class VIP. Non-Emergency cases (Cash Reimbursement): Outside KSA - no prior approval for VIP; inside KSA - covered for all classes without prior approval (R&C costs for non-appointed providers; reimbursement limits for dental & optical apply to VIP).
